contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.authorc.AuthorContentBiographyHTML:
I currently work as a Senior Systems Developer for the digital web agency NetConstruct.

We specialize in building websites using Kentico Xperience, Kontent by Kentico, and other CMS platforms.

I have been awarded MVP status for Xperience by Kentico in 2022, recognizing how passionate I am about their DXP offering and how much I have helped members of the community.

I am a certified developer for Kentico Xperience and an active member of the Kentico open source community.
